entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 24 April 2023
